    • Constructor Detail

      • SimBoardQuarMono

        public SimBoardQuarMono(Disease disease,
                        java.awt.Rectangle dimens,
                        int numPeople,
                        double asymptomaticChance,
                        double socialDistanceValue,
                        double socialDistanceChance,
                        double minAge,
                        double maxAge,
                        int minPreExistingConditions,
                        int maxPreExistingConditions,
                        double timeUntilIsolate,
                        double reinfectRate,
                        double quarantineChance,
                        double antiBodyTime)
        Creates a SimBoardQuarMono (one area, quarantine board) to simulate the actions of people that are displayed on SimBoardPanel
        Parameters:
        disease - The disease object used for a simulation
        dimens - The rectangle that represents the area a person can move in
        numPeople - The total number of people in the simulation
        asymptomaticChance - The percent of people who are asymptomatic
        socialDistanceValue - The number of pixels each person tries to stay apart by when social distancing is enabled
        socialDistanceChance - The percent of people who participate in social distancing
        minAge - The minimum age of a person in the simulation
        maxAge - The maximum age of a person in the simulation
        minPreExistingConditions - The minimum pre-existing conditions of a person in the simulation
        maxPreExistingConditions - The maximum pre-existing conditions of a person in the simulation
        reinfectRate - The percentage of people that can be reinfected once they loose resistance
        antiBodyTime - The time it takes for antibodies to expire
        quarantineChance - The percent of people that will quarantine when sick
        timeUntilIsolate - The time it takes for a sick person to go into quarantine

    • Method Detail

      • updateDimensList

        public void updateDimensList(java.awt.Rectangle updatedRect)
        Creates an ArrayList of rectangles that represent dimensions of different parts of the sim board (including the quarantine zone)
        Overrides:
        updateDimensList in class SimBoardMono
        Parameters:
        updatedRect - The current rectangle for the bounds of the SimBoardPanel

      • quarantineCheck

        public void quarantineCheck()
        Checks if a sick person needs to go into quarantine if they participate. Then checks if they recover and returns them back to their section of the board
        Specified by:
        quarantineCheck in interface Quarantinable

      • drawQuarLine

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
